attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!
attributes.userName: I'll meet you at the tree 🤫😝
attributes.review: this app took over an hour to download even though I have plenty of storage and ran EXTREMELY poorly. it was glitchy and aggravating and very hard to operate. the app is dysfunctional and should be taken down IMMEDIATELY!!

attributes.title: DO NOT GET! IT’S A SCAM
attributes.review: this app is terrible. whoever designed it seriously needs help. as soon as i got it my phone started glitching. there is now a virus on my phone and ALL my social media has been hacked. i will now have to get a new phone. what a scam!

attributes.title: Fellow Trump Supporters Beware!!!
attributes.review: This app is a fraud!! I downloaded so I could worship the only president for me 🇱🇷🇱🇷 but after it took two days to download, I realized the truth!!! Someone had hacked the Trump servers and were sending Furry P*rn to everyone who put in their number!! DON’T FALL FOR IT!!! TEAR THE APP DOWN!! IT’S NO LONGER SAFE FOR OUR STRAIGHT CIS WHITE EYES!! SPREAD THE WORD!!!
Took 5 months to download ✨ once it was finally downloaded and I refused to open the app 🧚🏿 I received push notifications every second ✨ I would rate it 0 stars if possible 🧚🏿

attributes.title: terrible just terrible
attributes.review: the app made my whole phone crash and showed no important updates. It also took over 2 days to install.

attributes.title: awful app i wish i could give it 0 stars💩
attributes.review: i can’t even believe this app exists. i am at a loss of words 🤭. i opened this app not expecting to see a vile 🤢disgrace to the nation of america 🇺🇸. it is by far the worst 👎use of an app i have ever seen👀 and there was an app dedicated to goats 🐐and i would rather pay three dollars 🤑for that then to ever see this app again. i am flabbergasted 😲 at this act i might have to go to therapy after seeing this. 🤧😵😭

attributes.title: Horrible horrible
attributes.review: Huge trump fan, but this app is truly awful. Extremely slow download and the app doesn’t even work properly. Quite disappointed.

attributes.title: Horrible!!
attributes.review: This app is actually awful. First, it took forever to download. Like seriously 3 days? That’s long as hell. I couldn’t even navigate through the app at all once it downloaded too.

app was laggy and took so long to download. after downloading my phone crashed for 27 hours would not accept my phone number or payment methods. intructions unclear for faq. worst app ive ever downloaded 😌🤚 horrible layout and hard to navigate. i also did not appreciate the jumpscare of the man on the front when u first open the app. terrifying. app crashed every two seconds and i will be deleting immediately 🥳

attributes.title: This is ridiculous😩😫😖😣
attributes.review: Trump almost started world war 3 because he killed someone in Iran for no reason and because of it we almost got nuked he needs to be impeached as soon a possible. PLZ read this it is super important
